main.value:
{
    "caption": "Main title",
    "name": "header_title",
    "description": "This will be displayed in the header section below the main menu. The text will automatically be inherited on child pages, but can easily be overwritten by entering something new, or deleted.",
    "type": "text",
    "category": "Header",
    "sortOrder": "1",
    "defaultValue": "@INHERIT",
    "templates": [
        "@@templates_all"
    ]
}

{
    "caption": "Subtitle",
    "name": "header_subtitle",
    "description": "This will be displayed under the main title. Will also be inherited on child pages by default.",
    "type": "textarea",
    "category": "Header",
    "sortOrder": "2",
    "defaultValue": "@INHERIT",
    "templates": [
        "@@templates_all"
    ]
}

{
    "caption": "Background image",
    "name": "header_background_img",
    "description": "Use an overview image of this resource as background. This will override the Background setting above, and will NOT be inherited on child pages.",
    "type": "option",
    "category": "Header",
    "sortOrder": "11",
    "inputOptionValues": "Use the Panorama image==background_img_pano||Use the Wide image==background_img_wide",
    "templates": [
        "@@templates_all"
    ]
}

{
    "caption": "Inheritance",
    "name": "header_inheritance",
    "description": "This setting controls whether values are inherited or not on all child pages of this resource.",
    "type": "checkbox",
    "category": "Header",
    "sortOrder": "99",
    "defaultValue": "@INHERIT inherit_titles||inherit_background",
    "inputOptionValues": "Inherit titles==inherit_titles||Inherit background==inherit_background||Inherit CTA==inherit_cta",
    "templates": [
        "@@templates_all"
    ]
}
